name: Endless Winter (itch) (Clyrex)
description:
I made this for Winter GameJam. 

In this game, the sun has lost its power and the earth has become engulfed in a never-ending winter. As Fecilis, Pedes, and Scila, you must team up to fix the sun and bring warmth back to the world. Along the way, you will face formidable monsters and other challenges.

I created this game all by myself, using only my skills and some free resources. I apologize if the graphics or audio aren't up to professional standards, as I am not a graphic designer or audio maker. However, I hope you enjoy the game and have fun playing as Fecilis, Pedes, and Scila on their quest to save the world from eternal winter!
